name: Talent Not Included
description: Set in the fantasy land of Notthatmuchfurther, Talent Not Included tells the story of three actors, ready for anything, in order to give the performance of their life even if that means facing mechanical soldiers, animals, hardheaded monsters as well as rotating cylinders at their feet. Break a leg, you'll need it !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (32 and 64 bits) and above. Processor: Intel Celeron E1500 @2.2 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual 5200+ @2.6 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600 GT (256 MB) or AMD Radeon HD 2600 XT (512 MB) Storage: 394 MB available space
